Action.author: amber-zhang
Action.body: Suggest Fabric peer container's log can be redirected to a file so that the log can be further analyzed offline.

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: While doing some research into this, I found that there's a new school of thought on logging that appears to have a good amount of support and is actually in line with how we're logging at the moment: https://12factor.net/logs . Just throwing this out there as food for thought as I found a number of stackoverflow questions regarding logging that seemed to agree that using event streams and allowing the end user/administrator to determine the way they want to process the logs.

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: Makes sense. Just wanted to get the conversation going again.
